scripts.build: tsc --project . && esbuild --bundle dist/main.js --platform=node --tree-shaking=true --bundle --minify --external:clipboardy --target=node25 --outfile=dist/main.min.js && npm run build:copy-wasm
scripts.build:copy-wasm: mkdir -p dist/node_modules/@eagleoutice/tree-sitter-r/ && mkdir -p dist/node_modules/web-tree-sitter && cp node_modules/@eagleoutice/tree-sitter-r/tree-sitter-r.wasm dist/node_modules/@eagleoutice/tree-sitter-r/  && cp node_modules/web-tree-sitter/tree-sitter.wasm dist/node_modules/web-tree-sitter/
